content: this is a free pattern to create a basket with an oval base the basket can be used to organize your crochet hooks your stationery your make-up etc at the link provided you find all the instruction you need included the indication of the yarn i used at this link 1 below you can find a video i recorded to show how to create the oval with the help of stitch markers happy crochet 1 https //youtu be/m5udfxvj4bc
